knowledge: Iggy Pop . James Newell Osterberg Jr. (born April 21, 1947), known professionally by his stage name Iggy Pop (), and designated the "Godfather of Punk", is an American singer, songwriter, musician, producer and actor. He was the vocalist of influential proto-punk band the Stooges, who reunited in 2003, and is well known for his outrageous and unpredictable stage antics.
